item.title: 1003Emergency
item.description: 1003 Emergency 描述 As an emergency rescue team leader of a city, you are given a special map of your country. The map shows several scattered cities connected by some roads. item.title: 关于vscode安装gotools安装失败的办法
item.description: 第一个 go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn,direct 在终端改一下这个代理，Windows下cmd就可以，重启vscode再更新，一定要重启。 第二个 go env -w GOPROXY=https://mirrors.aliyun.com/goproxy/ 阿里的可能只能安装成功一
